title: Using Future Perfect Tense Correctly
objectives: Understand Future Perfect at Beginner level
Apply Future Perfect in real conversations

vocabulary.example: She will have finished by then.
By next week, I will have completed it.
He will have finished his homework.
I expect you will have arrived.

content.introduction: Welcome to this lesson on Future Perfect.
content.explanation: In this lesson, you will learn about Future Perfect at the Beginner level.
tips: Practice Future Perfect daily for best results.

exercises.question: Choose the correct sentence:
options: He will have finished his work by then.
He will finished his work by then.
He will have finish his work by then.

exercises.question: Predict what you will have achieved by the end of this year.

culturalNote: Future Perfect is used in American business and academic contexts to emphasize completion deadlines and project milestones.
